sources.name: SourceProduct
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceProduct

sources.name: SourceProductCategory
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceProductCategory
